name: .HC
summary: Learn about .HC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: While you can open and edit a Holy C source code file in any text editor, HC files are meant to be edited, compiled, and run within the TempleOS operating system. TempleOS includes its own source code editor that allows developers to open, edit, and create HC files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .hc file in IDRIX VeraCrypt
images.caption: HC file open in IDRIX VeraCrypt
